    android-sdk (1.0.0) / com.techcentrix.sdk / TechCentrixSDK

    TechCentrixSDK

    object TechCentrixSDK

    TechCentrix SDK lets you manage and share LED Displays.

    Functions

    Name Summary
    handlePushMessage fun handlePushMessage(message: RemoteMessage): Unit
    Handles RemoteMessage received in FirebaseMessagingService.
    init fun init(config: SDKConfig): Unit
    Initializes TechCentrix SDK. Note: It can be called only once and must be called before any other actions.
    isInitialized fun isInitialized(): Boolean
    Returns true if SDK is initialized.
    isSignedIn fun isSignedIn(): Boolean
    Returns true if a user is signed in.
    isTechCentrixPushMessage fun isTechCentrixPushMessage(message: RemoteMessage): Boolean
    Returns true if RemoteMessage received in FirebaseMessagingService should be handled by TechCentrix SDK.
    signIn suspend fun signIn(oneTimeToken: String): Boolean
    Signs in/up a user with the given oneTimeToken.
    signInAsync fun signInAsync(oneTimeToken: String, listener: FutureListener<Boolean>? = null): Future<Boolean>
    Signs in/up a user asynchronously with the given oneTimeToken.
    signOut suspend fun signOut(): Unit
    Signs out the current signed-in user.
    signOutAsync fun signOutAsync(listener: FutureListener<Void?>? = null): Future<Void?>
    Signs out the current signed-in user asynchronously.
